item.title: About
item.description: rust-bitcoin refers to the GitHub rust-bitcoin organization and also to the main repository (and Rust crate) within that organization. The rust-bitcoin crate is a library that supports the Bitcoin network protocol and associated primitives. It is designed for Rust programs built to work with the Bitcoin network. Crates The rust-bitcoin organization includes a number of repositories containing various Rust crates that you may find useful when writing Rust code that interacts with the Bitcoin network.
